Name: Bouncy Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Igglybuff, Jigglypuff, and Wigglytuff.  Swap an Iggly-Dew and an Iggly-Card for a Bouncy Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
